personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.bio: Passionate software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading development teams. Specialized in full-stack development with a focus on modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud architecture.

experience.description: Leading a team of 5 engineers developing microservices architecture for the core platform. Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%.
Built and maintained multiple customer-facing applications serving 100K+ daily active users. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards.
Developed RESTful APIs and responsive web interfaces for enterprise clients. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, kanban boards, and team analytics.

projects.title: AI Chat Bot
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot powered by machine learning for customer support automation.
